translation: “I offer my obeisances to Śrīla Bhakti Bimal Avadhūt Mahārāja, the embodiment of Nitāi-Gaura’s compassion. His vast intelligence dwells in endless ways (vaikuṇṭha vṛtti) to serve and distribute the highest mercy. An unconventional devotee (bhaktāvadhūta) he is pure (vimal) as he possesses exclusive dedication to the service of the holy name lotus feet of Govinda (Krishna) and his Guru Śrīla Bhakti Sundar Govinda Dev-Goswāmī.”
